title: Mystic Comics
additional-notes: A note in the 1969 CCE Periodicals volume says to 'consult copyright office' for full issue renewal information.  The first cataloged issue renewal, mentioned in the July-December 1977 CCE Periodicals volume, is for the March 1940 issue (the first one published), and was filed in 1967.

Two series of Mystic Comics were published in the 1940s, one from 1940 to 1942, and one from 1944 to 1945.  Renewal records for all issues in both series can be found in the July-December 1977 CCE Periodicals volume.
